title: Cherry tomato salad
ingredients: ['40 cherry tomatoes, halved', '170g pitted and sliced green olives', '170g pitted and sliced black olives', '2 spring onions, minced', '85g pine nuts', '120ml olive oil', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste']
